scenario.name: UAS Register
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:1001@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1001@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:1001@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 3600 User-Agent: SIPp Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:1001@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1001@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: <sip:1001@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> [authentication username=1001 password=1234] Expires: 3600 User-Agent: SIPp Content-Length: 0
